body:
SELECT a/data[at0001]/items[at0003]/value as date_time_at_diagnosis 
FROM EHR e[ehr_id/value=$ehr_id] 
CONTAINS COMPOSITION c  
CONTAINS (EVALUATION a[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis.v1]) 
WHERE a/data[at0001]/items[at0002]/value/defining_code/code_string matches {'C501','C502','C503'}  
LIMIT 1 ORDER BY c/context/start_time/value DESC
